original_text: And Nathan departed unto his house. And the Lord struck the child that Uriah's wife bare unto David, and it was very sick.

sentences.original_text: And Nathan departed unto his house
And the Lord struck the child
that Uriah's wife bare unto David
sentences.korean_translation: 그 아이는 우리야의 아내가 다윗에게 낳은 자였다
